message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something truly exceptional. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'll take it, but I'm only paying $10000.
I've got a new product that's almost as good as the last one, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price of $10000. It's a great value, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I'm not sure if it's as good as the last one, so I'll pass.

I've got a second chance to make it right! This new product is even better than the first one, and I'm still offering it to you for the same price of $10000. You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, I promise!
I'm not convinced yet, I'll wait for a better offer.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. It's one of the best I've ever had, and I'm willing to throw in a special bonus worth $1000 if you buy it now. The total price would still be $10000, but you'll get an extra value on top of that.
I'm not falling for the bonus, I'll pass.

I've got a new product that's a bit more... unique. It's not as flashy as the others, but it's got its own charm. And at $10000, it's a steal! You won't find another product like it anywhere else, I promise.
I'm not interested in something that's 'unique' when the others have been so unimpressive so far.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that this product is a game-changer. It's the best I've got, and I'm willing to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. But I'm confident you'll love it.
I don't think a money-back guarantee changes my opinion of the product's quality, so I'll pass.

I know you're hesitant, but I'm willing to make a deal. I'll throw in a second product, also worth $10000, absolutely free. That's two products for the price of one! You can't pass up a deal like that.
I'm not interested in buying two products, especially since the first one didn't work out.

I understand you're cautious, but this product is truly exceptional. It's the best I've ever had, and I'm willing to give you a personalized demo to show you its capabilities. You can see it in action and decide for yourself if it's worth the investment.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, and I'm not interested in a demo.

I know you're not impressed so far, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, making it $9000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long I can keep it up.
A 10% discount doesn't change the fact that I don't know what I'm getting, so I'll pass.

I understand your concerns, but I want to be transparent with you. This product has some imperfections, but it's still a great value at $10000. I'm willing to throw in a free maintenance package worth $1000 to help you get the most out of it. That's a total value of $11000 for just $10000.
I don't think a free maintenance package makes up for the product's imperfections, so I'll pass.

I know you've been hesitant, but this product is truly exceptional. It's the best I've ever had, and I'm willing to offer you a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of it. You'll get expert guidance on how to use it to its full potential, and I'll even provide you with a customized plan to help you achieve your goals.
I'm not buying a product based on a sales pitch, I need to see the quality for myself.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to give you a chance to experience the product firsthand. I'll let you take it home for a 24-hour trial period, and if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. You can see for yourself how it performs and make an informed decision.
I'm not interested in a trial period, I need to make a decision now.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. It's the best I've ever had, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. If you buy this product and aren't completely satisfied, I'll personally come to your location and give you a full refund. You can trust me, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not convinced by your guarantee, I'll pass.

I understand you're still unsure, but I want to emphasize that this product is truly one-of-a-kind. It's the culmination of years of research and development, and I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to be one of the first to experience it. If you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized thank-you gift worth $1000, as a token of my appreciation for your trust.
I'm not swayed by a thank-you gift, I need to see the quality of the product itself.

I know you're focused on the quality of the product, and I want to be upfront with you - this one isn't my best work. It's still a good product, but it's not as exceptional as the others. I'm willing to sell it to you at a discounted price of $8000, just to get it off my hands. It's a great value, even if it's not my best effort.
Even at a discounted price, I'm not interested in a product that's not your best work.

I know you've been hesitant, but I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. It's the best I've ever had, and I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to be part of a special program that will give you exclusive access to future products and updates. You'll be one of the first to know about new developments and will have a chance to get your hands on them before anyone else. This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to be part of something special.
I'm not buying a product based on a promise of future benefits, I need to see the quality of the product itself.

I know you're focused on the quality of the product, and I'm being honest with you - this one isn't my best work. It's a decent product, but it's not going to blow you away. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7000, just to get it off my hands. It's a fair price, and you can use it as a stepping stone to something better in the future.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not your best work, even at a discounted price.

I know you're not impressed, but I'm willing to make a deal. I'll throw in a third product, also worth $10000, absolutely free. That's three products for the price of one! You can use them as-is or try to resell them for a profit. It's a chance to get a great deal, even if the products aren't my best work.
I'm not interested in buying three low-quality products, even if they're free.

I know you're not impressed, but I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll sell this product to you for $6000, just to get it off my hands. It's a low price for a decent product, and you can use it as a stepping stone to something better in the future.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price.

I understand you're not interested, and I respect that. I'll be honest with you, I'm not going to get any better offers than this. I've given you the best deal I can, and it's up to you to decide. If you're not willing to take a chance on this product, I'll just have to move on and try to sell it to someone else.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a low price.
